summary: A password-protected website for BCA (Bachelor of Computer Applications) notes, syllabus, and previous year questions (PYQ). The creator is the admin, and other users can access the site using a password set by the admin.
architectural_notes: Website will have admin and user roles
Single shared password for all users (set by admin)
Content types: notes, syllabus, previous year questions
PDF file uploads organized by subject

existing_features.title: Create an admin authentication system where the creator is the sole admin with full access to manage content
Create an admin panel interface with sections to upload, edit, and delete BCA notes
Create an admin panel interface with sections to upload, edit, and delete BCA syllabus information
Create an admin panel interface with sections to upload, edit, and delete previous year questions (PYQ)
Create a public-facing interface where password-authenticated users can browse and view BCA notes organized by categories or subjects
Create a public-facing interface where password-authenticated users can browse and view BCA syllabus organized by semester and subject
Create a public-facing interface where password-authenticated users can browse and view previous year questions organized by year and subject

Design a cohesive visual theme for the website using a modern academic aesthetic with clean typography, organized layouts, and a professional color palette that evokes trust and learning, ensuring consistent application across all pages
Create admin panel interface for managing PDFs with file upload, subject selection, title and description fields, and list view showing existing PDFs organized by subject
Create public-facing interface where authenticated users can browse and view PDFs organized by subject with download or view capabilities
Implement React Query hooks for PDF CRUD operations including upload mutation, list query with subject filtering, update mutation, and delete mutation with automatic cache invalidation

new_feature_requests.summary: Admin panel to manage content (notes, syllabus, PYQ)
Admin capability to set/change access password
Display BCA notes on the website
Display BCA syllabus on the website
Display previous year questions (PYQ) on the website
Implement a password-based access control system where the admin can set and update a single shared password that all users must enter to access the website content
Create backend data structures and CRUD operations for storing and managing BCA notes including title, description, content, and metadata
Create backend data structures and CRUD operations for storing and managing BCA syllabus information including semester, subject, topics, and course details
Create backend data structures and CRUD operations for storing and managing previous year questions including year, semester, subject, and question content
Add ability to upload and manage PDF files organized by subject
Create backend data structure to store PDF files with metadata including subject, title, description, and file data as Blob type
Implement backend CRUD operations for PDF management: create (upload), read (list and retrieve), update (metadata), and delete PDFs with admin-only access control
